body_html:
also i noticed the syntax asked by clang-format is a bit different on CI now. could you let me know the latest syntax definition is?

/me summons @yifeif

could you help re-run the tests?

OK. @yifeif is there any way to make this process of rerunning the tests less work for us? Like, is it possible to give whchung the ability to kick tests himself?

/me summons @yifeif

could you help re-run the tests?

OK.  @yifeif is there any way to make this process of rerunning the tests less work for us?  Like, is it possible to give whchung the ability to kick tests himself?
body:
> also i noticed the syntax asked by clang-format is a bit different on CI now. could you let me know the latest syntax definition is?

/me summons @yifeif 

> could you help re-run the tests?

OK.  @yifeif is there any way to make this process of rerunning the tests less work for us?  Like, is it possible to give whchung the ability to kick tests himself?
